summary: The climbing of an immense staircase made up of the most varied stairs. Symbolic scenes occur on different levels where characters seem to be prisoners of their deeds and of their own folly... See full summary »
cast: Maurice Baquet|Jean-Marie Bon|Martine Couture|Jacques Faure|Mario Gonzales|René Patrignani|Rita Renoir|Alain Salomon|Dominique Serrand|Nicolas Serreau
title: L'ange
